alert.note: Alert for Allegheny; Beaver; Butler; Lawrence; Washington (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 05 at 8:09PM EDT until April 05 at 10:00PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 815 PM EDT FOR EASTERN BEAVER...NORTHERN WASHINGTON...SOUTHEASTERN LAWRENCE... SOUTHWESTERN BUTLER AND NORTHWESTERN ALLEGHENY COUNTIES... At 809 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Mars, or 7 miles east of Cranberry, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines, resulting in some power outages. Locations impacted include... Pittsburgh, Ross Township, McCandless Township, Cranberry, Moon Township, Franklin Park, Shaler Township, Hampton Township, Robinson Township, Economy, Bellevue, and Kennedy Township. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report severe weather by calling 412-262-1988, posting to the NWS Pittsburgh Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSPITTSBURGH.
